publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4971 Tommy Sheridan: Glasgow - Education Deprived Cityâ€”That the Parliament expresses grave concern over the recent publication of Scottish Index of Multiple Deprivation 2006: General Report which states that Glasgow City contains almost one third of the 15% most education-deprived data zones in Scotland and that the most education-deprived data zone in Scotland is Parkhead in Glasgow; notes with concern that Glasgow has four of the five most education-deprived data zones in Scotland, and calls on the Scottish Executive to act with urgency to improve education for the pupils of Glasgow City, to invest in teacher training and to reduce class sizes to no more than 20 pupils. Supported by: Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Colin Fox*
